exception.name: ErrorSecureElementDisabled
exception.description: This exception is thrown if SE API functions are invoked which need a non-disabled Secure Element but the Secure Element has been disabled.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorSecureElementDisabled that is thrown if SE API functions are invoked which need a non-disabled Secure Element but the Secure Element has been disabled.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when attempting operations on a disabled Secure Element
specification.applicability: All operations requiring active Secure Element
